评论详情: I love everything about these shorts. I find them to be super comfortable & wear them doing pretty much anything~as far as exercise I walk only, I don’t wear these for intensive activity. Initially I went by the sizing chart based on my waist & hip~which was a large. For me they were too large & fit oddly. They were nothing I wanted. I gave the navy blue a shot with a medium. Now I’m 160-165lbs but losing. My weight is in my butt. I loved how the mediums fit. I do have to pull them up in the back on occasion but I’m ok with that because I love how they fit every other place. The inner lining I have no problem with. If I had thicker thighs I could see how that would be a problem but I don’t. I love the drawstring. I material is 90% polyester & 10% spandex so there is a little bit of a stretch to them. The inner pocket does hold my XR iPhone with no problem at all. I only use the pocket for my cell on occasion. I love the pocket though, it’s great for keys, cash, a credit card. Because of my measurements I don’t know how helpful my review is for you. The way these wear on me is my personal preference. I like them tighter & they’re not uncomfortable. I’ve purchased other colors but only kept the navy blue & black. The ash blue material coloring were different shades & I didn’t like the look. I took a chance on the white but felt they were too see through. So I’m happy with the 2 colors I have. I was them on cold on the hand wash cycle & hang them to dry. There were no issues with stitching or loose strings. They wash great & after drying they are set to go. So this is my experience with these shorts. I’ve waited to write a review because I wanted to wear & wash to see the true quality. For me they are a quality short & I’m happy with what I paid for them. I hope my pictures are helpful. I recommend them but feel due to the style & sizing they may not be everyone’s favorite shorts.

This is my 3rd pair of these shorts in the last 2 months. Very well made, have all 3 colors available as I need multiple for everyday exerciser and all around comfort during these hot months. Love that I can put my phone in the “Skorts” underneath in the side pocket, right thigh and it firmly stays with no movement or fear of lose. A definite WIN WIN WIN in my book, I might order a couple more black pears, so I have every day covered, and also as black as my favorite color for shorts. If they had more solid colors (hint hint hint manufacturer!!!) I would order them. Thank you for the unparalleled design and thought into this clothing item. GREAT JOB!!!

5'5" ; 150ish lbs ; 37" hip ; 32" waist Ordered a size Large and WAY too big. I missed my return window so I do not know if I would be happier with a smaller size. With it being extremely large on me they pooch up in the front due to the extra material. I may try ordering a smaller size in the future. The material has a great stretch and seems to be very well made. The color and pattern is vibrant and absolutely beautiful The inner tight leggings portion is super breathable and stretchy. It also has rubber along the bottom to help keep them down. Love the adjustable waist band. Helps customize the waist fit. The side pocket is stretchy and holds my phone plus other items with ease.  Main thing I do not like: The sides are not slit open. They are sewn closed. I prefer the shorts that have the split. I find it easier to access the pocket with the split.

评论概述: Flattering but weak liner and pocket
类型: Size: SmallColor: Black Grey Non-slip Belt
评论详情: I liked the fit of these shorts, I am 117 lbs, 5 foot 5.  The inner short could be improved with a better compression fabric so a tighter fit could be achieved.  There is one interior pocket that my phone bounced around in but I got used to during my run.  I would prefer a pocket on each side not just one.  The headline description says "pockets" but there is only one singular pocket on the right side.  If you are a lefty then I guess these may not be the shorts for you.  I found the grips on the legs pretty useless as well.  If the inner liner were just a bit longer,  the grips would probably function as intended.  So far I like the functionality of the all in motion shorts from target the best, but the cut/appearance of this short is less flouncy and more flattering on me.

These shorts are INCREDIBLY comfortable! They are very light and breathable.  Even though several reviews said it fits as expected or larger, being a plus size woman, I tend to lean on the side of caution and ordered a size up. I’m ok with the fact that I did, but it wasn’t necessary.  As most reviews have also said, the under layer isn’t tight fitting, either. I’m ok with that, but if you’re going to actually use these for running, then you might want a tighter fit. And it’s not a tight-woven spandex. It’s thinner.  The pocket is only in the right side (not sure if that was in the description) but it fits my iPhone XR nicely.  I plan on buying another pair or two, but in my regular size.

I love these! I'm a curvy size 8-10 with a booty. I need shorts that are quick dry, comfortable and great for walking in with the family in Texas heat, but also a cover up at the pool/water parks. I ordered a Medium in the maroon color. In love! I love the liner and it doesn't ride up. However, if you are prone to thigh chaffing, I will day these won't save you from it due the length of the liner. These are a snug fit and I like it that way so when I swim in them, they won't ride down or fall off.  I did order a Large in the black so I had something more for physical therapy days and work outs. Not sure why but they fit a bit tighter than the medium. The tag definitely says large on it.. So, I'm hoping it was a fluke and going to reorder the black in XL.

I was expecting for these shorts to be worn in the privacy of my own home - strictly for lounging. However, to my pleasant surprise they are great looking and comfortable enough to wear while running errands and working out. LOVE THE HIDDEN POCKET! This day in age, we carry our phones everywhere. We NEED pockets for them. Yes, women’s clothing, I’m speaking to you! Men’s fashion has always included pockets (even PJ’s)! Our phones are accessed so many times per hour that it’s not something that I want to put in a purse. Need more pockets in clothing. This is a great way to keep up with your phone while active or not. My iPhone 11 Pro fits securely in the pocket (in the under layer of the shorts - which are NOT skin tight or uncomfortable as most are). Bend, move, stretch and workout while your easily accessible phone is secure in a pocket that is large enough to comfortably hold the phone without it dropping out. I also appreciate that the pocket is NOT over the buttocks. I can comfortably sit and lie down without sitting on the phone. I’m getting another pair because I think they’re genius!

评论概述: Comfy but not quite what I needed
评论详情: I'll start with what I liked. The material is nice and soft. They're very comfy. I got them for running and the pocket. The pocket holds my phone well. I ran for miles and it felt secure the whole way, even with me taking it out and putting it back mid run. The pocket is great. The material is breathable. I was in warm weather and felt great. I love the color. The downside is that for me they rode up a lot while running and therefore wouldn't prevent thigh chafing on long runs. This is actually the main reason I thought the 2 in one design would be good. The outside layer actually helped more than the inner layer I thought would. I understand that probably not everyone has this problem, so I'm sure they're great if not. It annoyed me to keep worrying about pulling them down while trying to focus on more important things like pace and breathing. I only took off one star since that's a specific problem that doesn't necessarily reflect poorly on the product. I'll still wear them lounging or walking or possibly even easy bike riding but they're just not the running shorts I needed.

I love the colors of these shorts, that’s why i bought them.  I wanted to make them work, but, they are SHORT!!  and, the bikers alone a lot!! I was constantly pulling them back down.Too short for my liking  anyway.  but, the color is awesome!!

评论概述: Do not recommend for active wear
评论详情: The shorts are comfortable and the pocket is very nice. I think they would be great for going to a picnic, sporting event or other casual activities. However, I cannot recommend them for exercise or other periods of activity.  The inner lining (with phone pocket) did not stay in place during my walk or while I was working in the yard.
The shorts rises while walking
Fits well and nice fabric

I've been looking for shorts that have the short cover underneath but aren't the new style that have cuts all the way up or flowy. These remind me of my old school soccer shorts. I think there very flattering

评论概述: Does Run Small but they are comfortable
评论详情: Inasmuch as these do run small, they are very comfortable and the pocket to hold a phone is perfect.  The pocket sits under the outer part of the shorts within the lining.  The lining is very soft, a little heavy but not too bad. The shorts overall are comfortable but would be interested to see what a large would fit like (not sure if they would be baggy in the front or not so keeping the medium).  I ordered a medium which is what I normally wear (5'5 130ish). They are very comfortable and soft, just wish they were more true to size. I estimate they are about a half size too small if that makes sense.
If you are a size 18/20 in jeans or a 2x leggings get the 3x shorts so glad I did they are form fitting these shorts run small the 2x would not have fit gorgeous color and super comfortable though

I have to agree with the other reviewers these shorts are SUPER comfy.  But the undershort is to flimsy to hold a phone comfortably while doing a lot of movements like running or HIIT workouts.  I'm 5'4 and 171 lbs.  These shorts aren't very forgiving of that either.  But they definitely are comfy and that is always a plus in my book.  So if you have much cellulite on your hips and thighs like I do and you are very self conscious of it maybe get a different pair.  But if you are like me and know that every body is different and your working on your body and sometimes need to be reminded of that then these might do the trick!  They are helping me stay focused to get to my goal weight.  Down 85 pounds since last Aug.  So I'm not too worried about this.  Heck last year I wouldn't have been able to even wear these shorts!!  Im happy.
Love these shorts for working out. And size is perfect
These shorts fit perfectly and are so comfortable.

评论概述: good fit and feels as expected.
评论详情: good fit and feels as expected. The only thing is that the undershort rides up the leg, even with the anti-slip thing it has.
The fit is as expected.  The pocket holds my phone well.  Great for pickle ball to jogging. A must in my wardrobe.
I have a lot of cellulite and my thighs and in my bottom and I struggle with finding a pair of shorts. These shorts hide everything
Got these today size medium i am 5'5 approx 150-160 lbs and these stretch and fit comfortably!!
Comfortable and just the right amount of coverage.

评论概述: Great fit love the no slip "belt"
评论详情: So comfy.  And NO riding up or flashing your butt checks when you bend iver because of the no slip belt incorporated into the bottom on inner lining.  But you dont even know its there! Not too tight or uncomfortable!  Great design. And then what I love about the "outer" part of the short, is that it just sits flat., Not ballooning out like a diaper, which is how alot of these types of shorts with inner linings look.Now all they need to do is offer them in some more tradition colors.. like dark navy, bright white, deep red,. Enough with the garish pastels!  Lol

so first of all I got these because I have big thighs and my shorts come up when walking and running. now these shorst are nice but the spandex underneath is shorter than the actual shorts so they still come up. I wouldn't recommend these for my thicker girls/women💗 just a heads up ! Also really stretchy material like swimsuit like. also they fit a bit weird like the back kinda sags so it makes u look flat.

For sizing reference, I’m 5’5”, 134 lbs, athletic build and ordered a small.  Definitely cannot use these shorts to run in with the phone in the hidden pocket. My phone fell out within the first quarter of a mile and hit the pavement. I think the phone would stay just while walking, but it certainly isn’t a snug fit by any means. It bounces around and against your leg.  As you can see in the photo I uploaded, the drawstring is incredibly long. No idea why anyone would need a drawstring in that length. Once I tied it, it was easy to just slip inside the shorts - and because of the inner shorts liner, it wouldn’t come falling out the leg. So it wouldn’t be completely kill it for me if that’s all that was wrong with these shorts.  Over all, I would not recommend these shorts since I was really looking for something for running with my phone snug in a pocket- and this definitely didn’t work.

评论概述: I returned these shorts because they were too small.
评论详情: I am normally a medium but these fit tighter than I would have liked.

The shorts fit great. The fabric was soft and cozy, but it's the kind of fabric that has a lot of friction. So, the shorts don't actually work for running - they caused more chafing than they relieved. But if you're looking for comfy, modest shorts, these are great!
Nice, comfortable and they don’t feel as they are too tight on your thighs. Breathable shorts that move well with a hard workout.

These shorts are very comfortable and a nice material. I had to size up. I typically wear a medium and am a size 6 jeans. The medium was tight and too short so I returned them and got a large instead. The large fit perfectly.  I would definitely buy these again. I plan to use them for a cruise excursion that involves swimming, sliding down rocks and zip lining. I think they will work perfectly.
Great for working out in. Lost my other shorts  and was able to replace them quickly
I’ve purchased before a different color. This color had a rubbery ring on each inner shirt leg and made it creep up and feel sticky.

These yoga shorts has an inner shorts with a pocket for my phone & is so comfortable.  My black ones (same brand) are gym shorts with a much snugger inner shorts so I prefer these.  Fits great!  Use these at home all the time and my phone is always with me.  Perfect!

评论概述: Love them, but they turned pink after washing
评论详情: Love these shorts! I got them in white and they are extremely comfortable and light. Perfect for playing soccer or working out. However, when I washed them the red inner tag bled and they turned a shade of faint pink. Definitely disappointed, as they were perfectly white before washing. Cut the tag out before washing!!

I like these shorts for running and lifting weights.  They are comfortable and lightweight.  I think the length is perfect.  The only two things I didn't like about these shorts were (1) the tie string is way too long and just looks bulky under my shirt and I see no reason for so much string and (2) I wish the little tights under the shorts were tighter.  They seem to ride up a bit and aren't tight on my legs.  If they were a little more fitted around my leg, I don't think they would do that.

I'm 5'8" and about 160lbs so after reading reviews and looking at measurements  I went one size larger. Ohhhh, Hello baggy butt lol.  Too difficult to return and exchange in light of the pandemic and the shipping mess so I will try to figure out how to take them in.  Nice material though.  The large and medium fit me better.  Other issue is the "yoga" lining is not snug at all and is rather thin.  BUT I like them and they are very comfortable so they are a keeper for lounging around the house.

评论概述: The undershort is closer and stretchier than I would expect.  Not spandex at all.
评论详情: I like them quite a bit. They are soft the color, was perfect and exactly as shown. The string tie provides additional tension to ensure they stay up.  The under short is more stretchy than I would have liked and does not fit as snuggly to my legs as I had hoped.  Because of this when I put my phone in the pocket the undershort hangs down and the phone swings against my leg.  While walking this is fine but is annoying while running and causes me to fear of losing my shorts while running.

If you could call working on the 2ac garden "working out" I guess that would be it. We have a well established "garden", if I want music or just to keep my phone handy I need pockets, most shorts with pockets are too heavy to work outside. These are light and airy, yet strong enough to carry phone all day without constantly worrying about my shorts falling off. Absolutely would buy, WILL buy again.
They did fit really well but with movement in yoga class I feel they would ride up instead of staying down

I purchased these to wear for my daily walk. I usually have my phone because of the app to track my distance, so the pocket was a MUST. The fit is good, but I find the inner shorts to be a bit too loose on my thighs, they tend to ride up a bit. Only a mild annoyance.  I have been wearing them daily since I received them (they arrived 3 days earlier than expected...bonus!)  Wash up great and dry quickly.

I love that they are so soft and comfortable! The liner with the pocket is not only handy, but helps me feel secure in that my bottom is fully covered with movement. They also are very cool for a hot run, and dry very fast. I bought three different colors, and plan to buy more. Great quality and product for the money spent. The only thing that makes it a little hard is keeping the phone in the pocket during a run. The phone bounces. A key, or other small items do not bounce much. Having a phone and other small items in the pocket is perfect for walking around or hiking in the mountains, and allows your hands to be free.

I love these shorts! The shorts underneath don’t ride up and the pocket fits my phone. When I run, I don’t even notice my phone because it’s not hopping around like other shorts I’ve had. It stays in place. I’ll be buying more in different colors. The print is exactly as shown too.

Very happy with these shorts! They fit perfectly with enough give for bending and stretching modestly. Short! Which I like because being a plus size shortie, it’s usually hard to find a normal length (so many designers think all big girls must be giants. I’m short, curvy, big bottomed. For reference, I’m 5’2ish (5’3” on a good day. Ha ha!) and weigh between 220ish. I gained the covid 19plus!! (Ha ha!!) And I just started working out again. I’m pretty confident these shorts will serve me as my inches shed, too. The drawstrings seem generous and the inner shorts are tight enough they’ll loosen nicely. Overall, I’m so happy! I’m going to order more!
Super comfortable! Fits TTS, cool design.

评论概述: Pretty color but the 2 I got seemed messed up.
评论详情: The two I got, both pairs had one of the legs fabric sticking out/up more on one side then the other. I wish they didn’t. I also didn’t like the seam on the inside of the bottom part of the shorts. I loved the teal blue color though.

These shorts fit great and are not too form-fitting. Comfortable for all activities. I love being able to carry my phone discretely everywhere I go. I ordered 7 pairs of these shorts it varying colors and love all of them. These are my go-to shorts for the summer.
Bought these to walk in. Loved how it had an inside pocket. Unfortunately putting your phone in the pocket makes them slide down on that side. Wasn’t comfortable so I retuned
Very wearable. I’m going to get more.

Never been one to wear compression shorts under perfectly good shorts but was looking for a short that could possibly hold my phone while running. It fits in the pocket but it jostles when I run and pulls the shorts further down. After one wash the seams on one of the draw strings broke and always seems to be the one that gets pulled out all the way while the other gets lost in the waist band. The waistband itself feels like too much. I don’t like too much around my midsection when running and it was all just.. fussy and thick. Recommend buying only if you don’t plan on using the pocket for anything heavy and wash inside out and take care to tie the strings before washing. Too much fuss for a busy mom.
Very comfortable, true size, i like the pocket on the liner.

They fit and feel great, not too tight around the belly, and have nice wide leg openings. I mostly use these for lighter workout days  or walking the dogs they are so comfortable! The outer layer is a bit heavier than I like because I sweat so darn much running or doing strength training. Having said that, the way they allow me to move so freely and not get caught on my upper thighs would make them perfect for those workouts so I highly suggest them for all workouts if your not a person who gets swamp ass easily!

I ordered these and two other brands shorts. I'm a size 5/6 in jeans and ordered a small. These were the only pair that fit. The other brands were way too big. I run hard and lift. They might ride up on the outer layerbit the inner layer keeps anything from showing.  The pocket is a little hard to use and there is only one, otherwise I really like these shorts

these shorts are great for my situation.  Following right shoulder surgery, they are easy on and easy off.  Very comfortable,  if I were to run, walk or even yoga they would move right with me.  The only negative is the pocket is on the right side which I cannot reach easily.  It would have been nice to have the pocket on both sides.

评论概述: great shorts! drawstring is so long! though!
评论详情: These shorts are great! I like the 2 layer design.  The drawstring is very long though! It got tangled up ended up having to come out. Luckily, I don't need the drawstring to use the shorts. If I did, it would be a problem.

Only downside about these shorts is that it seems like the inner part and the outer are separating. But still not disappointed all around. I was nervous because of a few reviews. These feel great don’t roll and the pocket is big enough for my iPhone 12pro. Though I would not trust the material to have phone in my pocket while running

评论概述: The most comfortable running shorts I’ve ever worn!
评论详情: I’m always worried about the spandex being too tight but these are SO comfy and they don’t squeeze your legs at all. They’re super stretchy too! I’m definitely planning on buying more come spring time. I think I’ll buy down a size next time though. I typically wear a medium/large so I bought a medium but they’re just a smidge too big. Nothing to complain about though. The pocket fits my phone perfectly and I’m not afraid of it falling out when I’m jumping around or running. I’m very happy with this purchase!!

These are my new perfect shorts.  The size large fits me perfectly.  My legs and butt are size 8 but I’ve got a muffin top after two babies. So I gravitate towards elastic waisted pants.  As soon as I wore these once, I jumped on Amazon to buy more.  The fabric is divinely silky and comfy, wicking my gallons of sweat off quickly and keeping me comfortable on my walks in the hot sun. The inside, hidden cell pocket is in the perfect place where my hands/arms don’t bang against it while I walking.  Seriously great shorts.

I love these shorts!!! Firstly the vibrant colors make me happy. The texture....so soft. It's super comfortable. It's so stylish. I can wear it with just about any color top. I have received many compliments in the gym, and I have directed all to Amazon. I am one happy owner and customer of these shorts.

I like these shorts. I’d buy them again, although the phone pocket isn’t wide enough for a iPhone plus with a case. I got a medium. I’m 5’7” and 142 lbs with a little belly because I had a baby 2 1/2 months ago. They fit not too tight, and not too loose.

I bought these for lounging at home on very hot summer days, so that I can be outdoor-ready, but I might be too embarrassed to wear them if I'm going far from home, as they are shorter than expected. I am not a runner, but I can't imagine anyone who is a trained jogger would want to wear these for the activity. The pocket is under a layer of shorts, I assume so that it can't bounce out of the pocket, but a zipper or Velcro would be better than pressing my device against my warm leg. Overall they're interesting, I might purchase the Bermuda shorts from the same company, but one pair of these are enough for me.

I thought these were really comfortable to wear and run in. The inside shorts didn't ride up, but they are loose around my thighs. I bought a large, but I could've worn a medium no problem. The phone pocket is good, and I didn't worry about it falling it. It's also in an otter box. I did have to tie the shorts tight because I worried the weight of the phone would eventually pull them down, but it wasn't uncomfortable at all. Weirdly long drawstrings. After my first run, I ordered a second pair.

评论概述: Just about perfect. Love the phone pocket.
评论详情: I love these. Only down fall, I wish under layer was tighter. My inner thighs touch always have even at 115lbs. I have issues with shorts riding up when running. (Annoying) for the most part these do t do that. Like I said the liner could be a little more snug. The phone pocket is perfect. They don’t sag under the weight of the phone in the pocket.
To short for me but otherwise great

评论概述: Lov the shorts Only thing I would like is more pockets
评论详情: more pockets

I have now bought 2 pairs of these shorts and will buy more in the future. The pocket on the inner short is extremely convenient and fits a cell phone perfectly. However if your phone is heavy it will cause your shorts to sag a little. The lighter blue look a little pajama-bottomy but they’re perfectly functional. The inner short does not ride up which is a huge bonus and helps a gal feel a bit more modest while wearing a short short. Overall I do recommend them.

评论概述: Comfy, pocket not functional for exercise
评论详情: Extremely comfortable and lightweight. The string around the waist is absurdly long. I intentionally ordered them big so I can run in them while pregnant (ordered a small and I normally wear 0-2).  They have one pocket on the right side. It works fine to hold my phone while lounging or walking/hiking, but it’s too small and loose to hold anything while running which was hugely disappointing.

评论概述: liner is not briefs but cutt
评论详情: These look nice, like the tie at the waist but the liner is large and baggy so it doesn't feel like wearing briefs -so be comfortable with running free...the phone pocket is good. The gripper is good but doesn't grip as its wide. But totally adequate and I'm a runner always looking for the best option for phone carrying.

They fit well and I love the material. Only complaint is that they keep riding up the waist, so they become high-waisted after 10 minutes of wearing them. (which I imagine is better for you if you're carrying a phone in the pocket, but I'm usually not.) Also one weird thing about them is that the drawstring is super long for the medium size. (like over a foot of excess on both ends)

I love the phone pocket! I wouldn't trust a run or bike ride with a phone in there but great for walks and throwing on over bathing suit to walk the beach without leaving your phone on the blanket. Although I read the reviews, for some reason I thought the bottom layer would fit tighter to my thighs but it did not.
These are quite comfortable - and I like that the inner short is a bit longer.  They do run a bit smaller than expected

These shorts are fine, I got the version with the inside pocket with non-slip band, but the inner liner is NOT long enough to prevent chub rub and rides up. Maybe it's just because I have a larger bottom, or I should have sized down, but I just pull the inner shorts up like briefs and call it a day because it's not worth pulling them down constantly.

评论概述: Nice shorts but inner layer is NOT compression material
评论详情: Shorts are actually cute and functional.  I would have given it more stars if the description on one of the images didn't advertise as compression.  The inner layer is just a thin stretchy material.  It is not form fitting at all.  Even if I had gotten one size smaller, it would still not be "tight".  But I still like it as I really wanted running type shorts with an under layer so my underwear doesn't show when I'm doing crunches at the gym.  I also wanted a deeper pocket for my phone when I'm not working out.  It's perfect.

Whether I'm working out at home or taking a walk around the neighborhood, these shorts are just what I need.  They don't ride up and they hold my phone in place even while I'm riding my bike!  Love these, I have 3 pairs in 3 different colors!
Sorry they just more what I expected. I didn’t like the fit or the pattern and just not what I wanted pickle ball.

First of all I normally wear a size 8 pant and ordered a medium. They aren't snug and at first I wondered if I ordered a large but they are still comfy. I feel like they will still be comfy if I gain or lose weight. So far my only complaint is that there is only one pocket which does fit my large cell phone and case easily, but I like having a second pocket for my house key. Overall I will very likely buy a second pair.
Love the full inside pocket.  Comfy but could be a better quality.  Sufficient for working out.

Great shorts for summers walking and jogging.  Im 5'-2", 140lbs and ordered a medium and in fits perfect.  The legs are around 3" inseams.  I like the hidden pocket for my phone.  Lightweight, comfy, drawstring elastic waistband. Because the shorts are a 2 layer construction there is no see-through or VPL issues going on.  Was slightly disappointed that the interior short is a synthetic polyester material, but they still wore well during activity. They did fine in the laundry in the washer and dryer.

Overall I like these. It seems true to size. I love the inner hidden pocket. It fits my phone just fine. The only thing I dont care for is the liner. I wish it was a little more form fitting so that it didn't ride up as much when exercising, but its not bad enough to keep me from wearing them and they're still comfortable.

While the inside lining is not "compression", these are by far the most comfortable shorts I own and I now own three pairs. The waist band is flexible but holds and is soft, so, it doesn't dig. I purchased the XL and they are true to size for me. I'd say they're great for working out and lounging.

I was disappointed with the inner lining material. It is just a mesh lining. I wanted something more like spandex. I admit I may not have read the description very close, but the photo makes it appear like the inner lining is more form fitting. They are very comfortable, but I have issues with both parts riding up. I haven't worked out in them for that reason. If they ride up just walking around, I assume they would be really bad if I tried to run in them.

The waist was slightly tighter compared to what I prefer and the legs were wider than I had intended. The side pocket is not ideal for any modern phone since it’s cut small and it can’t withstand the weight and dimensions of a smart phone. Otherwise, it is a great concept. I wish the elastic had more give, the leg spandex were tighter, and the pockets were more durable. I find the shorts to be more useful to lounge around the house in.

I am 5'2" and 139 lbs and ordered a large.  I wanted shorts that were loose and long enough to wear in public, but were comfortable for HIIT and other online workouts.  My biggest concern was that these shorts would bunch uncomfortably between my thighs, but they do not!  They're a little shorter than what I usually wear, but fit well and are perfectly acceptable for athletic shorts.  And they stay put while working out.  I've ordered a couple more pairs.
I liked the shorts. They fit, but were too tight, so order up a size. The phone pocket sat too high for me, and i'm not sure if that was because the shorts were a size too small or not.

评论概述: *IT ONLY HAS ONE POCKET*, but it works as advertised i think.
评论详情: It's a good pocket- not too skinny and it's fairly deep. Shorts themselves were a little too short for the thighs- i chaffed a little and kept having to pull it down, but it wasnt nearly as bad as i thought it would. It's comfortable as far as that kind of material goes.

评论概述: Not a useful phone holder for runners
评论详情: Nice pair of shorts if you are just looking for a lined pair of running shorts with a hidden pocket. I specifically bought them for the phone pocket, thinking the inner lining would be a compression short fit. Unfortunately, this is not the case, so when you put a phone in the pocket, it bounces and flops around against your leg like any other pocket... and maybe a bit worse, as it makes the phone ride against your upper thigh instead of at your hip. Totally not helpful in a long run.

评论概述: Practical and comfortable but not supportive
评论详情: Purchased the XS for fit female: 5’4” 115 lb.  size was just right but as others have noted, the spandex liner is loose which then leaves the (standard-size iPhone 7) to flop against the leg a bit.  Hence only 4-stars.  It is very comfortable and not short-short either, so she’s keeping.

These shorts are super soft / comfortable! They are great to work out in but also cute so you could wear them out to run errands or whatever. The inner lining is great for us thick thigh girls! Fitted as they should be but not tight!! I am 5'0" but thick. My hips are about 45 / 46 inches and my waist is 30 inches. Again thicker thighs and I went with an XL. AMAZING! I bought 3 pairs and will for sure buy more!

I really like these. They fit great & feel great.  They are light weight & airy. They are form fitting but not tight. Really nice for a run on a hot day. I'd give 5 stars if they only had a pocket on both legs

I usually wear a size 4-6 depending on the brand and bought a medium.  They were tighter around my waist and the shorts underneath were very loose.  I thought they would be more like compression or even spandex shorts, but they weren't, and I have a big butt and thighs for my waist size.  Aside from that, they are light weight and comfortable for around the house, but probably not great for real exercise.

comfortable item, fits well and standard to true sizing. The pocket is not useful as it is angled wrong, you would need arms in the back of you to use it. Other than that feature not being thought out well the shorts are good for hanging out or exercising.
Nice well made shorts. I would recommend ordering a size up unless you like tight fitting running shorts.

Bought these for my teen daughter to wear for soccer so they would ride up while running. The under shorts are not fitting and ride up terribly. She likes them enough to keep them but can wear them for what I bought them for.

I really liked the idea of these shorts. They are pretty comfortable overall, and I really loved the fact that it had a pocket for your phone which is extremely helpful. However, the spandex portion constantly rides up. It does not stay in place. It is not tight so it is not keeping itself down. Then the whole shorts ride up. I am pretty disappointed because I have one pair of shorts from a different company that stay in place but have no idea where I got them!

评论概述: Comfy, but don't stay in place.
评论详情: I like these shorts and I haven't had any issues with my phone staying in the pocket. That being said, they do ride up so I won't be wearing them for running, as they become too short since they don't stay in place.

I like the material on the pant is very soft. I didnt like the 5 ft long drawstring or the amount of elastic on the waist. I wanted a soft waist and didn't take a good look, my fault. I like the pocket and liner short, but the pocket bounces up and down with my phone. I want something more tight to the skin. However these are great for lounging and walking. Foe running I would recommend something more comfortable at the waist with tighter pocket.

I tried working out with these for the first time and they tend to ride up very easily. The “compression” shorts underneath do not compress very well and ride up. Otherwise they are comfortable and the hidden pocket is nifty. I believe I bought the correct size. I usually wear a small and I was worried if they would be too small. If you can, size down. I would try again if they had an Xtra Small.

UPDATE: I just tried to run in these with my phone in the underneath pocket. My phone bounced so much inside the pocket in the inner shorts that I was worried the shorts were going to get yanked off my booty. :(  These are pretty comfortable for working out. I ordered a medium but the undershorts are not tight at all, they are rather baggy. I was hoping for tighter undershorts. At least they don’t ride up.

评论概述: run small or are meant to be more fitted than i typically wear running shorts
评论详情: run small or are meant to be more fitted than i typically wear running shorts
My new favorite shorts. They’re great for running, sit a little higher up then I would like, across my belly button, but my thighs don’t rub together when I run.
Great price for comfortable workout shorts.
